title: 80's style font...
content:
Im working on some designs for a club night. One of my Ideas involved an 80's style Michael Jackson 'Thriller' album type font, the kind of text the was quite prominent in the 80's, with a slant on the text - almost hand written, often with a colour gradient and black out line. Does any one know of a font that would match this criteria? Any suggestions would be very welcome, Thanks alot.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215224006im_/http:/typophile.com/files/thriller2_4304.jpg)
author: Etch

comments.content:
Well, first off, I believe that was hand-written and probably my MJ himself.

Secondly, I'm not familiar with this style you're talking about, unless you're referring to graffiti style which was very promonient in the 80's rise of hip-hop and rap.

If you're just looking for a hand-written looking script, check out The Bluemlein  
Script Collection at [http://www.sudtipos.com/home](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215224006/http:/www.sudtipos.com/home "http://www.sudtipos.com/home") I'm sure you'll find a suitable script there.

Not exactly like the MJ cover, but matching what you're talking about in your description is [Xtreme Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215224006/http:/artandsignstudio.com/xtremescript.html). You also might get some inspiration by taking a look at this collection of [VHS Covers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215224006/http:/www.filmsamling.se/instick/index.php)
